snippet.title: Black Trail - Official Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1576420/Black_Trail_VR?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=releaseDateTrailer&utm_medium=video
Black Trail is a VR FPS, set in an epic war in the Old West. Play as a seasoned bounty hunter and a respected Native American warrior, fight through war-torn lands, master the use of a wide range of historical weapons, and change the fate of war as you unleash the true powers of ancient artifacts.

Steam Release Date: April 8, 2024

Twitter: https://twitter.com/BlackTrailGame
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@blacktrailvr
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/2bQhRTmrYt

Official Website: https://www.blacktrailgame.com/

#virtualreality #vrgaming #gamedev
